input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Ledge Lounger"
Reference Product Name: "Essential Umbrella"
Reference Product Description:
Our multi-operational Essential Umbrella features an aluminum center pole and is ideal for both in-pool and on-deck use. High-quality materials, such as fiberglass ribs, sewn-in vents, and marine-grade fabrics make the Essential Umbrella resistant to wind, corrosion, rust, and warping. Choose from hundreds of canopy and pole combinations to create the perfect umbrella to match your personal style.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Ledge Lounger Chair Shade In-Pool Chair Sun Shade Accessory'
  - Name='PURPLE LEAF 13-ft Aluminum Crank Cantilever Patio Umbrella Polyester LSGLRR'
  - Name='Purple Leaf 12-ft Aluminum Navy Crank Cantilever Patio Umbrella'
  - Name='Frontgate European Round Side Mount Umbrella'
  - Name='Grand Patio 9Ft Enhanced Aluminum Umbrella w/ Tilt and Crank'
  - Name='Pinnacle Ledge Lounger'
  - Name='Purple Leaf Square Offset Cantilever Umbrella'
  - Name='Essential Fiberglass Umbrella Square Crank Auto Tilt Matte'
  - Name='In- Pool Affinity 2 Piece Sun Chair Lounger'
  - Name='PartyPad Ledge Pool Swim Up Bar'
  - Name='In- Pool Affinity Square Sunbed Ledge Lounger'
  - Name='Purple Leaf 10-ft Aluminum Navy Crank Cantilever Patio Umbrella'
  - Name='In- Pool Square Sunbed'
  - Name='Frontgate 11' Cantilever Round Side Mount Umbrella with Base'
  - Name='Ledge Lounger Chaise Shade In-Pool Lounger Sun Shade Accessory'
  - Name='PURPLE LEAF 7' x 7' Square Patio Umbrella'
  - Name='Purple Leaf 8x8 ft Cantilever Square Outdoor Patio Umbrella with 360 Rotation and'
  - Name='Ledge Lounger Signature Chair and Side Table In-Pool Set'
  - Name='Ledge Lounger Signature 360Â° Tilt In Pool & Outdoor Umbrella'
  - Name='In- Pool Signature Sectional Middle Ledge Lounger'
  - Name='Ledge Lounger Shift Daybed'
  - Name='Ledge Lounger Autograph Chair'
  - Name='Laze Hammock Ledge Lounger'
  - Name='PURPLE LEAF 9 FT Cantilever Patio Umbrellas'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ledge Lounger Chair Shade In-Pool Chair Sun Shade Accessory
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a shade accessory for chairs, not a stand-alone umbrella, making it somewhat related but not directly comparable in function or construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PURPLE LEAF 13-ft Aluminum Crank Cantilever Patio Umbrella Polyester LSGLRR
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a cantilever patio umbrella with aluminum pole and crank operation similar to the reference's outdoor umbrella use, but differing in mounting style (cantilever vs. center pole).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Purple Leaf 12-ft Aluminum Navy Crank Cantilever Patio Umbrella
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to the previous, a cantilever outdoor patio umbrella with aluminum pole and crank; relevant in function but different construction and style from essential umbrella's center pole design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate European Round Side Mount Umbrella
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A side mount outdoor umbrella related in function but differs in mounting method and likely design features compared to a center pole essential umbrella.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Grand Patio 9Ft Enhanced Aluminum Umbrella w/ Tilt and Crank
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A 9ft aluminum umbrella with tilt and crank closely matches the features and probable function of the reference product, making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pinnacle Ledge Lounger
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a lounger product rather than an umbrella, so it is not very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Purple Leaf Square Offset Cantilever Umbrella
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cantilever offset umbrella serves a similar shading purpose but differs in mounting style and structure from the center pole essential umbrella.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Essential Fiberglass Umbrella Square Crank Auto Tilt Matte
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This appears to be a similar umbrella variant from the same brand featuring fiberglass ribs and crank/tilt function, closely matching the reference product in materials and operation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: In- Pool Affinity 2 Piece Sun Chair Lounger
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A lounger seating product unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PartyPad Ledge Pool Swim Up Bar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pool bar product, completely unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: In- Pool Affinity Square Sunbed Ledge Lounger
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A sunbed lounger product unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Purple Leaf 10-ft Aluminum Navy Crank Cantilever Patio Umbrella
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar outdoor cantilever aluminum umbrella with crank, related in function but different in style and pole placement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: In- Pool Square Sunbed
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A sunbed product, unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate 11' Cantilever Round Side Mount Umbrella with Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Outdoor umbrella with cantilever side mount design, related functionally but different mounting and possibly mechanism compared to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ledge Lounger Chaise Shade In-Pool Lounger Sun Shade Accessory
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chair/lounger shade accessory, designed to augment seating rather than a stand-alone umbrella; somewhat related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PURPLE LEAF 7' x 7' Square Patio Umbrella
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Square patio umbrella relevant in use and materials though likely different in pole style and operation from reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Purple Leaf 8x8 ft Cantilever Square Outdoor Patio Umbrella with 360 Rotation and
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cantilever design outdoor umbrella, related by shading function but differs by offset pole and mount.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ledge Lounger Signature Chair and Side Table In-Pool Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Seating and table set unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ledge Lounger Signature 360Â° Tilt In Pool & Outdoor Umbrella
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A signature line umbrella by same brand with 360Â° tilt feature designed for both pool and outdoor use; nearly identical in purpose, materials, and style to reference umbrella.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: In- Pool Signature Sectional Middle Ledge Lounger
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Seating sectional unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ledge Lounger Shift Daybed
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Daybed product unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A chair product unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A hammock lounger product unrelated to umbrellas.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PURPLE LEAF 9 FT Cantilever Patio Umbrellas
